title: Will Mars be a One-way Trip? - Slashdot
author: Samzenpus Please-Send-Paris-Hilton Dept
description: alexj33 writes "Will humans ever really go to Mars? Let's face it, the obstacles are quite daunting. Not only are there numerous, difficult, technical issues to overcome, but the political will and perseverance of any one nation to undertake such an arduous task is huge. However, one former NASA eng...
cleaned_text: "Don't try to outweird me, three-eyes. I get stranger things than you free with my breakfast cereal." - Zaphod Beeblebrox
